wikipedia_page.main: William Thomas is a Welsh international lawn and indoor bowler.

response: ;1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur: Silver Medal in the men's pairs; with Will Thomas. Rob was given the honour of carrying the Welsh flag & led the Welsh team out at the opening ceremony.

Will Thomas may refer to:
* Will Thomas (novelist) (born 1958), American novelist
* Will Thomas (basketball) (born 1986), American basketball player
* Will Thomas (bowls) (born 1954), Welsh lawn and indoor bowler

Williams won a fours gold medal at the 2000 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Johannesburg with Stephen Rees, Will Thomas and Robert Weale.
Eight years later won a gold medal in the fours at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh with Hafod Thomas, Robert Weale and Will Thomas.
He won a gold medal in the fours at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh with Jim Morgan, Robert Weale and Will Thomas.
